TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ReferenceConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供将对象引用与其他表示形式相互转换的类型转换器。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert object references to and from other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常在已放置的组件的上下文或设计环境内使用。The is typically used within the context of sited components or a design environment. 如果没有组件网站或不可用 ，则此转换器的用途很少。Without a component site or a usable , this converter is of little use. 此转换器转换对象的引用，该对象实现 接口并在 " **属性** " 窗口中显示其属性。This converter converts a reference of an object that implements the interface and displays its properties in the **Properties** window. 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅 基类和 [如何：实现类型转换器](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120))。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120)). > [!NOTE] > 永远不应创建类的实例 。You should never create an instance of the class. 而应调用 类的 方法。Instead, call the method of the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅基类中的示例 。For more information, see the examples in the base class. 此类提供 方法来检查是否可以将特定值添加到标准值集合中。This class provides the method to check whether a particular value can be added to the standard values collection. 如果不想将该值添加到集合中，请重写此方法。If you do not want to add the value to the collection, override this method.

para.span: 如果您不希望向标准值集合添加值，则重写方法。

span.span: Override the method when you do not want to add a value to the standard values collection.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示此转换器是否可使用指定上下文将给定源类型的对象转换为引用对象。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object in the given source type to a reference object using the specified context.

returns.span: 如果此对象可以执行转换，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this object can perform the conversion; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 此参数可能为 `null`，因此总是需要检查。This can be `null`, so always check. 同样，上下文对象的属性可以返回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

summary.span: 使用指定上下文和参数将给定值对象转换为引用类型。

The converted object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法最常用于在类型与字符串对象之间进行转换。This method most commonly converts types to and from string objects. `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 此参数可能为 `null`，因此总是需要检查。This can be `null`, so always check. 同样，上下文对象的属性可以返回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

span.span: is .
The conversion cannot be performed.

abstract member IsValueAllowed : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext * obj -> bool override this.IsValueAllowed : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext * obj -> bool

span.span: An that provides an additional context.
The value to check.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示某个特定值是否可以添加到标准值集合中。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether a particular value can be added to the standard values collection.

returns.span: 如果该值是允许值并可以添加到标准值集合中，则为 ；如果该值不能添加到标准值集合中，则为 。

span.span: if the value is allowed and can be added to the standard values collection; if the value cannot be added to the standard values collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于与此关联的类型 以及每个为关联类型的组件，将调用此方法。This method is called for each value that matches the type associated with this and for each component found that is of the associated type. 默认情况下，此方法返回 `true` ，即允许将值添加到标准值集合中。By default, this method returns `true`, that is, it allows adding the value into the standard values collection.

para.span: 如果您不希望向标准值集合添加值，请重写此方法。

span.span: Override this method when you do not want to add a value to the standard values collection.
